name: crop and downsize
desc: The crop_and_downsize module is used to subset an image, or structured field.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Min I
properties.desc: The Minimum I is the minimum extent for cropping in the I direction.

properties.name: Max I
properties.desc: The Maximum I is the maximum extent for cropping in the I direction.

properties.name: Down Size I
properties.desc: The Down Size I control will set a factor for decreasing resolution in the I direction.

properties.name: Min J
properties.desc: The Minimum J is the minimum extent for cropping in the J direction.

properties.name: Max J
properties.desc: The Maximum J is the maximum extent for cropping in the J direction.

properties.name: Down Size J
properties.desc: The Down Size J control will set a factor for decreasing resolution in the J direction.

properties.name: Min K
properties.desc: The Minimum K is the minimum extent for cropping in the K direction.

properties.name: Max K
properties.desc: The Maximum K is the maximum extent for cropping in the K direction.

properties.name: Down Size K
properties.desc: The Down Size K control will set a factor for decreasing resolution in the K direction.
